function.description: Connect to a Microsoft SQL Server

parameterDescriptions.parameterDescription: The string that will be used to connect to the database.

function.longDescription:
To connect to MSSQL you need to provide a connection string that contains all the required information. The simple format of the connection string is:
jdbc:sqlserver://[server][:port][;[property]=[value][;...]]
Example:
jdbc:sqlserver://localhost/;database=Finance;instance=sqlexpress;user=MyUserName;password=MyPassword
Read more at: [What is the URL format used by jTDS?](http://jtds.sourceforge.net/faq.html#urlFormat)
